attributes.action: Look into the funding of research into XLP,HLH,EBV, and to encourage the health service to screen for it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: XLP,HLH,EBV are diseases that know one seems to know about in our health service, our GPs are also not aware of them. Only a few hospitals know about these diseases and only a few can treat them. yet they are life threatening to children XLP only affects boys and is triggered by Glandular Fever, HLH affects boys and girls at the ages of three and five years old, XLP triggers HLH and EBV,the only treament is a bone marrow transplant we need to screen mothers to find if they carry the XLP,HLH gene during Pregancy
